name: FruitDomino
description:
FruitDomino 1.0P.

Pair the same fruits! If you use from the first three dominoes (1, 2, 3), you earn 500 points. For the lettered dominoes (A, B, C), you don't earn points.

Dominoes 1, 2, 3 are random, A, B and C are fixed.

The pictures of the fruits are free pictures, from the www.clker.com website.
